name: SurveyJSExampleForm
description: Creates a form to exemplify the integration of SurveyJS.
author: StatCan Digital Innovation

SurveyJson.Text:
{
 "pages": [
  {
   "name": "page1",
   "elements": [
    {
     "type": "text",
     "name": "question1",
     "title": "What is your name?"
    },
    {
     "type": "checkbox",
     "name": "test",
     "title": "Select the programming languages you prefer",
     "isRequired": true,
     "choices": [
      "Javascript",
      "Java",
      "Python",
      "CSS",
      "PHP",
      "Ruby",
      "C++",
      "C",
      "Shell",
      "C#",
      "Objective-C",
      "R",
      "VimL",
      "Go",
      "Perl",
      "CoffeeScript",
      "TeX",
      "Swift",
      "Scala",
      "Emacs List",
      "Haskell",
      "Lua",
      "Clojure",
      "Matlab",
      "Arduino",
      "Makefile",
      "Groovy",
      "Puppet",
      "Rust",
      "PowerShell"
     ],
     "colCount": 4
    }
   ],
   "title": "SurveyJS example"
  }
 ]
}
